text: what we know is that the Pakistani army
has now entered the university campus
students are being evacuated
eyewitnesses have been telling local
journalists that about three to four
heavily armed gunmen entered the
university by climbing over the back
wall and then a gun battle started
between security guards and the
attackers for well over an hour a lot of
students were stranded they were hiding
in bathrooms and classrooms talking to
local TV channels speaking of their
shock and horror and how worried they
were we've started to see them coming
out of the university being evacuated
the gun battle was intense blasts were
heard and the gun battle lasted for well
over an hour the search operation the
evacuation operation is still continuing
